text: There is a tip a knife in the shimp sandwich. I spit it out from my last bite. I am not sure if I ate another parts of the knife as well.

I've visited Le Boulangerie Moderne a few times, and their staff are always rude. Once a barista even asked for my friends' order while texting! However, their pastries are delicious, so I kept going back.

However, the other day I purchased one of their overpriced cookies, and sat down to work on the computer. After about an hour, one of their staff came over, asked me if I spoke English, and said that I was sitting in their private space. I mentioned that I purchased a cookie, and he was like "Oh! I don't know why my manager asked me to talk to you, then." 

Rude staff AND snobs about their seating area?! Never again!!
a quick-service counter in a mall, not for those looking for a "french cafe" experience but my oh my are those almond croissants delicious!!!!

J'adore cet endroit!  Quoiqu'une fois sur deux,  on puisse tomber sur un employé dont la politesse laisse à désirer, je me rejoins toujours des préparations de la Boulangerie moderne. Salades, sandwichs et pâtisseries sont généreux en saveurs et toujours bien présentés. Les cafés sont bons!  Bien dosés. 

L'endroit n'est pas très grand mais le décor, alliant les aspects anciens du bâtiment et la touche moderne comme le blanc intégral, suffit pour nous faire apprécier le tout et nous donner envie d'y être.
